questions.question: Which clustering algorithm does NOT require specifying the number of clusters in advance?
questions.explanation: DBSCAN determines cluster count automatically based on density. K-Means and its variants require K to be specified.

questions.question: PCA preserves local neighborhood structure better than t-SNE.
questions.explanation: t-SNE is specifically designed to preserve local neighborhoods. PCA preserves global variance structure.

questions.question: In an autoencoder-based anomaly detector, anomalies are identified by:
questions.explanation: Autoencoders learn to reconstruct normal data well. Anomalies produce high reconstruction error because they differ from the training distribution.

questions.question: UMAP is preferred over t-SNE primarily because it:
options: Is faster and preserves more global structure
questions.explanation: UMAP is significantly faster than t-SNE and better preserves the global topology of the data while maintaining local structure.
